summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the acquisition of Lots 6, 7, 8 & 9, Block 2, McGraw's Washington Park Addition, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 10 of Plats, page 21, in King County, Washington, together with that portion of vacated streets adjoining which attaches to said premises by operation of law, for open space, park and recreation purposes; authorizing the payment of related costs; and authorizing acceptance of the deed for open space, park and recreation purposes.
